thread.section_title: The Grosvenor Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Thank you
thread.title_full: Thank you - Review of The Grosvenor Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: millshyland
title: Thank you
text: I had organised a 21st birthday trip for my daughter and partner to stay at this hotel today but through no fault of this hotel, a room had not been allocated. Fortunately I dealt with a lovely lady on reception( unfortunately did not get her name) who sorted out a superb room for them to stay in. She has turned what could have been a bad experience into a wonderful one. I thank you lovely lady.!
